thread.title: Canada | CFO Moves – week ending October 16, 2015
thread.title_full: Canada | CFO Moves – week ending October 16, 2015

author: Finyear, Quotidien Finance d'Entreprise
title: Canada | CFO Moves – week ending October 16, 2015
text:
Canada | CFO Moves – week ending October 16, 2015 Tracking CFO Movement Across Canada. articles liés Karim Bohn to be new CFO at PATRIZIA Immobilien AG Alimentation Couche-Tard Inc. (TSX: ATD.A ATD.B) [LAVAL, QC] announced that its Vice President and Chief Financial Officer, Raymond Paré, has resigned. WiMacTel [CALGARY] announced the appointment of Mark Weder as Chief Financial Officer. Mr. Weder has served as CFO, COO and VP of Finance in a broad range of industries, including manufacturing, communications and oil & gas services. Dealnet Capital Corp. [TORONTO] announced that Paul Leonard has been appointed Chief Financial Officer. Most recently, Mr. Leonard was Chief Financial Officer of CFF Bank. Prior, Mr. Leonard was the Chief Financial Officer of Ally Credit Canada. In addition, he was founding Chief Financial Officer of ING DIRECT. Dealnet’s former Chief Financial Officer, Ashish Kapoor has resigned. RYU Apparel Inc. (TSX-V: RYU) [VANCOUVER] announced the appointment of Robby Payment as Chief Financial Officer of RYU. From January 2006 to January 2014, Mr. Payment worked as Staff Accountant, Senior Accountant and Manager at Davidson & Company Chartered Accountants LLP. Prior to joining RYU, he was a Manager with DMCL Chartered Accountants LLP. Robby Payment will be replacing Jameel Vaghela as Chief Financial Officer.
